comments.en: 4 cartridges: one each for CMYK. Also 4 replaceable printheads.

CMYK printing, Large format: 13x19inch/A3 paper.

2500Cse model is US retail channel model, 2500Cxi model is US business channel model, 2500C+ includes PCL 5 support.

Best output quality reachable with the "hpijs" driver.

When used with HP's "hpijs" driver, this printer auto-detects the paper type and does appropriate dithering and colour adjustment internally, controlled by the hardware. So if you insert photo paper, the printer will print in its highest quality, no paper type choice in the driver's options is needed.
